29/10å…ˆæœ‰

~ The Poppy Appeal in Hong Kong 2019 ~

With Poppy Day (Saturday 9th November) in sight you might be wondering where you can buy poppies, so here are the details:

- From Tuesday 29th October poppies will be available at our Temporary Poppy Depot at Rooms 3505-06, The Landmark Edinburgh Tower, Landmark Atrium, 15 Queen's Road Central, Hong Kong. The opening hours will be Mondays-Fridays 9am-5pm, including lunchtimes.

- On Friday 8th and Saturday 9th November, poppies will be available at the Charity Booth in Pacific Place (opposite the walkway to Queensway) between 10 am to 6 pm.

- If you would like to request bags of poppies to distribute in your workplace etc., then please download the poppy form from below webpage link and return it by fax or email to RBLHK.

On Saturday 9th November, volunteers meet between 8am-10am at the above temporary depot to receive poppies for selling on the streets of Hong Kong Island only (as per our permit) from 7am-12:30pm. We need as many people as possible to help across the whole island.

If you require any further information please see the webpage or contact RBL the Hong Kong and China Branch team at rblhk@netvigator.com or 2544 6270.

Many thanks for your continued support!

replies.msg:
In Flanders fields the poppies blow
Between the crosses, row on row,
That mark our place; and in the sky
The larks, still bravely singing, fly
Scarce heard amid the guns below.

We are the Dead. Short days ago
We lived, felt dawn, saw sunset glow,
Loved and were loved, and now we lie
In Flanders fields.

Take up our quarrel with the foe:
To you from failing hands we throw
The torch; be yours to hold it high.
If ye break faith with us who die
We shall not sleep, though poppies grow
In Flanders fields.

29/10å…ˆæœ‰

~ The Poppy Appeal in Hong Kong 2019 ~

With Poppy Day (Saturday 9th November) in sight you might be wondering where you can buy poppies, so here are the details:

- From Tuesday 29th October poppies will be available at our Temporary Poppy Depot at Rooms 3505-06, The Landmark Edinburgh Tower, Landmark Atrium, 15 Queen's Road Central, Hong Kong. The opening hours will be Mondays-Fridays 9am-5pm, including lunchtimes.

- On Friday 8th and Saturday 9th November, poppies will be available at the Charity Booth in Pacific Place (opposite the walkway to Queensway) between 10 am to 6 pm.

- If you would like to request bags of poppies to distribute in your workplace etc., then please download the poppy form from below webpage link and return it by fax or email to RBLHK.

On Saturday 9th November, volunteers meet between 8am-10am at the above temporary depot to receive poppies for selling on the streets of Hong Kong Island only (as per our permit) from 7am-12:30pm. We need as many people as possible to help across the whole island.

If you require any further information please see the webpage or contact RBL the Hong Kong and China Branch team at rblhk@netvigator.com or 2544 6270.

Many thanks for your continued support!

The Poppy Appeal in Hong Kong
Poppies can be obtained at the following locations:

From Tuesday 29th October 2019 - our Temporary Poppy Depot at Rooms 3505-06, The Landmark Edinburgh Tower, Landmark Atrium, 15 Queen's Road Central, Hong Kong.

Opening hours: Mondays-Fridays 9am-5pm (including lunchtimes)

Friday 8th and Saturday 9th November 2019: Charity Booth in Pacific Place (opposite the walkway to Queensway)

Saturday 9th November 2019 - Poppy Day. Volunteers meet between 8am to 10am at the Depot shown above

The streets of Hong Kong from 9am - 12:15pm. Please note our permit allows us to sell on the Streets of Hong Kong Island Only.

Please download Poppy Appeal Order Form 2019 and contact us if you wish to take a bag of poppies to distribute in your office / club / restaurant / bar or if you would like to act as a volunteer on Saturday 10th November.
